hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Momentum Divergence in Bull Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When regime is BULL (confidence >65%) but SOL and 3 of {AVAX, DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP} show negative 5-day momentum while BTC consolidates (±2% range), subsequent BTC breakout above consolidation high triggers mean reversion catch-up in lagging alts averaging 8%+ in 3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In sustained bull markets, altcoin underperformance during BTC consolidation represents temporary capital rotation, not loss of conviction. BTC breakout triggers FOMO into lagging assets.
entry_conditions: At least 3 of {AVAX, DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP} show 5-day returns < 0%

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% average gain across selected altcoin basket
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC breaks below consolidation low (invalidates setup)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Lagging alts continue underperforming after BTC breakout in >40% of instances.
